Message: I wanted to become a flame.

I was fighting because
I wanted to become just
like Commander Paladea—
a flame of justice that burns down
the most terrifying of demons.

But, I didn’t find my brand of
justice going down that path.
The whole time,
I was depending on others
to give me a reason to fight.

Why did Commander Paladea
do something so horrible?

But, what I do know
is what I had admired.

Her beautiful white flame.
Her towering gentleness.

Her dazzling light that
embodies our bright future.

The more I thought about it,
the simpler the answer became.

After all, the sight I saw that day
is still etched deep in my heart.

Before long, our destination
came into view.
The headquarters of the
Armed Forces of Humanity,
still engulfed in black flames.
